thread.title: Adele appears to tease music fans with new material in TV ad
thread.title_full: Adele appears to tease music fans with new material in TV ad

author: Tribune wire reports
title: Adele appears to tease music fans with new material in TV ad
text:
Adele appears to tease music fans with new material in TV ad Adele 
Adele arrives for the Brit Awards 2012 at the O2 Arena in London. 
Adele arrives for the Brit Awards 2012 at the O2 Arena in London. (Jonathan Short / AP) Tribune wire reports Contact Reporter Did Adele preview her new song on British TV? 
Four years after her last album, the singer appears to have teased British television viewers with a snippet of new music, broadcast during an ad break on prime-time TV. 
The 30-second ad shown Sunday evening during TV talent show "The X Factor" featured Adele's distinctive tones over a black screen on which heartache-filled lyrics appeared. 
The ad ended with an ellipsis and contained neither Adele's name nor a release date for a new album. 
The London-born diva won six Grammy Awards for her 2011 album "21," and took home an Academy Award for the theme to the 2012 James Bond film "Skyfall." 
Adele's publicist declined to comment Monday. 
Associated Press
